description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: An issue was discovered in the default configurations of ROS2 Iron Irwini ROS_VERSION 2 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, allows unauthenticated attackers to authenticate using default credentials.

Se descubrió un problema en las configuraciones predeterminadas de ROS2 Iron Irwini ROS_VERSION 2 y ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, que permite a atacantes no autenticados autenticarse utilizando credenciales predeterminadas.
